thread.title: Pining for the fallen eight million Christmas trees?
thread.title_full: Pining for the fallen eight million Christmas trees?

title: Pining for the fallen eight million Christmas trees?
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Pining for the fallen eight million Christmas trees? 14 January 2017 Last updated at 00:19 GMT 
They bring joy, but are binned as soon as the needles start to fall. 
Poet Brian Bilston laments the fallen eight million Christmas trees the UK buys and discards every year. 
Video Journalist: Dan Curtis
